Chill by Netflix

A brand extension for Netflix in the personal care and sexual wellness market.

Category: Packaging
Instructors: Andrew Gibbs, Jessica Deseo
Year: 2017

Binging is Better Together

Netflix’s brand known for its award-winning content as much as it is its unofficial catchphrase: Netflix and chill?

This packaging project proposes a way for Netflix to finally own ”chill” through their signature playful, cheeky humor.

Sketching process

The form language of the packaging is derived from the shape of the Netflix logo. The curve allows for comfortable grip and easy pouring.
